title: Lawrence.of.Arabia.1962.4K.RST.JPN.Bluray.1080p.DTS-HD.x264-Grym

Lawrence.of.Arabia.1962.4K.RST.JPN.Bluray.1080p.DTS-HD.x264-Grym.mkv

NOTE:  To my knowledge the transfers used in both the Japanese and 50th Anniv.
